SELECT A.inOutSeq, A.inOutDt, A.resrcCd, A.qty, A.unitPrice, A.remark, A.flagYN, A.regDate, A.issueDate, A.issueID, ABS (qty*unitPrice) "supplyPrice", B.compNm, C.houseNm, F.fileUrl, CASE WHEN A.qty < 0 THEN "출고" ELSE "입고" END "inOut" FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblResourceInOut WHERE flagYN = 'Y' AND planYN = 'N' AND resrcCd != 0 AND resrcCd = #{resrcCd} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblCompany WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) B ON B.compCd = A.compCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblHouse WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) C ON C.houseCd = A.houseCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tableKey, fileUrl FROM tblFiles F1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(fileSeq) maxFileSeq FROM tblFiles WHERE flagYN = 'Y' AND tableNm = "tblResource" GROUP BY tableNm, tableKey ) F2 ON F1.fileSeq = F2.maxFileSeq ) F ON F.tableKey = A.resrcCd
ORDER BY A.inOutDt DESC, A.issueDate DESC

SELECT A.inOutSeq, A.inOutDt, A.resrcCd, A.qty, A.houseCd, A.unitPrice, A.remark, A.compCd, B.compNm, C.houseNm, D.resrcNm, ABS(A.qty * A.unitPrice) "supplyPrice", CASE WHEN A.qty < 0 THEN "out" ELSE "in" END "inOut" FROM ( SELECT * FROM tblResourceInOut WHERE flagYN = 'Y' AND planYN = 'N' AND resrcCd != 0 AND inOutSeq = #{inOutSeq} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblCompany WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) B ON B.compCd = A.compCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblHouse WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) C ON C.houseCd = A.houseCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblResource WHERE flagYN = 'Y' ) D ON D.resrcCd = A.resrcCd
